member.name: M:MMLib.ExcelTool.Reader.SheetNames(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all the sheet names stored in the excel file.

member.name: M:MMLib.ExcelTool.Reader.Excel(System.String,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Read the data of the workbook.
member.param: List of sheet to read, you can pass the name of sheet as a string or integer as the order
Ranges defining the number of rows and columns will be read. A standard area ref (e.g. "B1:D8").

member.name: M:MMLib.ExcelTool.Reader.CSV(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Read the data of the csv.
member.param: Ranges defining the number of rows and columns will be read. A standard area ref (e.g. "B1:D8").

member.name: M:MMLib.ExcelTool.Writer.Excel(System.String,System.String,Core.DataSheet[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves an excel file at the given path.
member.param: The directory where to save the file.
The sheets that will be printed into the workbook.
member.returns: An information message of the result.

member.name: M:MMLib.ExcelTool.Writer.DataSheet(System.String,System.String[],System.Object[][])
member.summary: Create a sheet with the data required.
member.param: The name of sheet, where the data will be stored.
The headers, matching the number of columns.
member.returns: A sheet read to be written.
